channel.title: Machine Learning on Chenyang‘s page
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Chenyang‘s page

item.title: Machine Leaning Final Revision Tutorial
item.description: Introduction This review note is madeI made this material as a final review note for QMUL Module CBU5201: Machine Leaning. It covers key points and some most difficult parts of this module. Tutorial I voluntarily conducted two 2-hour online tutorials to help students preparing for resit exams, in response to an initiative by the school. This material was created for that purpose. Note Some parts of material are adapted from teaching slides of CBU5201: Machine Leaning, especially some screenshots of those slides.

item.title: MLnote1:What does it mean to sample from a distribution?
item.description: This post was supposed to be finished and published. However, I did a bad job in Machine Learning final exam, therefore, I feel sad when I edit anything related to machine learning. So this post won’t be finished.
